q: How does respawning work in UYA multiplayer?
a: Players respawn after a short delay and can choose between their team base or any controlled node.

q: What happens when a player dies in UYA multiplayer?
a: Upon death, a player drops a weapon pack containing all their carried weapons.

q: Why is dying costly in UYA multiplayer?
a: Dying not only causes a respawn delay but also risks arming opponents with upgraded or rare weapons.

q: Do players lose upgrades upon death in UYA multiplayer?
a: Yes, dying resets all weapon upgrades for the player.

q: What drops when a player is killed?
a: All non-default weapons are dropped in a pack at the death spot, and any player can pick them up.
